turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, my name is Joe Brown, phone number is 717-485-1111 and I'm calling to order a coffee to pick up tomorrow morning.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi Mr. Brown, what kind of coffee do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's Joe and I want a Starbucks coffee. Yes, I'm in the mood for a Starbucks coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok Joe, which Starbucks do you want to pick up your coffee order at tomorrow morning?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Paxton Street in Harrisburg, Pa.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what kind of Starbucks coffee do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a Caramel Cloud Macchiato. Could you read the ingredient description off the menu to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes Joe, I certainly can. Ok, it contains egg and the Caramel Cloud Macchiato is light and airy with layers of fluffy foam*, cascading espresso, vanilla-flavored syrup and a drizzle of caramel. It's a whole new way to love your Macchiato.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What milk types are offered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have Almond, Coconut, Soy, Whole milk, 2% milk, and non-fat milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What milk type do you want on your Caramel Cloud Macchiati, Joe?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will try the Coconut milk this time. That sounds good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What size did you want? The have a short, a tall, a Grande, and a Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I wanted a Grande this time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok Joe, a Grande Caramel Cloud Macchiati with Coconut milk is currently available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time will you pick it up tomorrow morning?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Around 8am.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it will be there and waiting for your pickup tomorrow morning.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, exactly what I wanted. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Joe I am now confirming that your Caramel Cloud Macchiati is on order at the Paxton Street Starbucks and will be ready for pickup at 8 am tomorrow morning and that your receipt will be sent to your mobile device at 717-485-1111 via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK, thank you for all your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, it was my pleasure. bye for now.
